name: interactive-prompt-playground
description: Interactive playground for exploring OpenAI parameters

scripts.dev: powershell "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd frontend && npm run dev' ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd backend && npm run start:dev'"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
